DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate difference comfort end month Air Optix® lenses versus Biofinity® lenses habitual daily wear symptomatic soft contact lens wearer .
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Evaluation Two Monthly Replacement Silicone Hydrogel Contact Lenses
DOC.criteria: Must sign write informed consent document . Currently wear weekly/biweekly monthly sphere toric soft contact lens ( NOT include AIR OPTIX Aqua , AIR OPTIX NIGHT & DAY Aqua , AIR OPTIX Astigmatism , Biofinity Sphere , Biofinity Toric , ProClear Toric soft contact lens ) bilaterrally ( eye ) wear lens least 3 month , daily wear use ( extended wear ) . Symptomatic contact lensrelated ocular discomfort end lens wear day . Current contact lens prescription within available parameter study product . Able achieve visual acuity ( VA ) least 6/7.5 ( 20/25 ) eye study lenses available parameter . Willing wear study lenses least 4 hours/day least 5 days/week 1 month trial period . Willing able follow instruction , study procedure maintain appointment schedule . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Neophytes current wearer AIR OPTIX Aqua , AIR OPTIX NIGHT & DAY Aqua , AIR OPTIX Astigmatism , Biofinity sphere , Biofinity Toric , ProClear Toric soft contact lens . Any systemic ocular disease disorder ( refractive disorder allow dry eye permit ) , complicate factor structural abnormality would negatively affect conduct outcome study . Recent ( within 7 day enrollment ) current ocular infection , active ocular inflammation , glaucoma preauricular lymphadenopathy . A history ocular surgery/trauma within last 6 month . Topical systemic antibiotic use within 7 day enrollment . Topical ocular systemic corticosteroid use within 14 day enrollment . Participation ophthalmic drug device clinical trial within 30 day enrollment . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
